forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a glorious embrace of sunshine, with the warmth creeping closer to 72 degrees, though a gentle descent to around 70 brings a softening as the day wears on. A brisk west-southwest wind rustles through the streets, creating an invigorating atmosphere, with gusts playfully tossing the leaves about. The clarity of the sky is striking, unmarred by fog, allowing the iconic outline of the Golden Gate Bridge to stand proud against a canvas of azure, offering a spectacular view that invites wanderlust.

As evening approaches, the air will turn slightly cooler, settling around 53 degrees beneath a predominantly clear sky. The winds will calm to a whisper, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront. Layers will serve you well; perhaps a light jacket will suffice as the temperatures dip, especially as the sun ebbs below the horizon. Consider stepping out to savor the delight of a nearby café, absorbing the energy of the city while enjoying a book or engaging in conversation with fellow locals. Today is a gem—ideal for reflecting on life or catching up with friends amid the vibrant pulse of the city.
